1336090.name: SCP-ELM0
1336090.description:
“Containment breached. SCP-ELM0 is active. Evacuate immediately.”

SCP-ELM0 is a first-person horror game set in the depths of Site-32 after a catastrophic containment failure. Explore the aftermath where something far worse has escaped containment.

You are the last surviving member of your response team. Cut off, hunted, and left in the dark halls of the facility, you must uncover what went wrong and what SCP-ELM0 truly is before the entire site collapses around you.

There is no combat. No safety. No way to fight back. Just silence, shadows, and something that is always watching.

FEATURES

  • Narrative-Driven Gameplay: A story told through scattered documents, abandoned labs, and the terrified voice logs of those who didn’t make it out.

  • Stealth and Tension: Avoid detection. Every sound matters. Every shadow hides a threat.

  • Diegetic World Design: Your UI is part of the environment – no floating health bars, no map, only what the character sees.

  • Dynamic Ambient Audio: A living, breathing soundscape that shifts with your every move.

  • Terrifying Encounters: SCP-ELM0 learns as you play. The longer you survive, the more it adapts to you. You will never truly be safe.

  • Inspired by SCP Lore: Developed with respect to SCP community standards and Foundation-style documentation.
